001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.ActivationsCachedNeuron;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.ActivationFunction;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.GradientDescentModelDecomposer;
014
015import java.util.ArrayList;
016import java.util.IdentityHashMap;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Map;
019import java.util.stream.Stream;
020
021@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
022public class BackPropagation implements GradientDescentModelDecomposer<NeuralNetwork, Float> {
023
024    @Override
025    public Stream<GradientDecomposition<Float>> calculateDecompositionGradients(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Vector<Float> objectiveGradients, Array<Float> inputs) {
026        List<GradientDecomposition<Float>> decompositions = new ArrayList<>();
027        Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals = new IdentityHashMap<>();
028        for (int k = 0; k < neuralNetwork.coArity(); k++) {
029            decomposeAndSetErrorSignalForOutputNode(decompositions, neuralNetwork, objectiveGradients, errorSignals, k);
030        }
031        for (int l = neuralNetwork.getDepth() - 1; l >= 1; l--) {
032            int width = neuralNetwork.getWidth(l);
033            for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) {
034                decomposeAndSetErrorSignalForHiddenNode(decompositions, neuralNetwork, errorSignals, l, j);
035            }
036        }
037        return decompositions.stream();
038    }
039
040    private static void decomposeAndSetErrorSignalForOutputNode(List<GradientDecomposition<Float>> decompositions, NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Vector<Float> objectiveGradients, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int j) {
041        ActivationsCachedNeuron outputNode = neuralNetwork.getNeuron(neuralNetwork.getDepth(), j, ActivationsCachedNeuron.class);
042        ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation activation = outputNode.getCache().removeLast();
043
044        // determine error signal for output node
045        ActivationFunction activationFunction = outputNode.getNeuronFunction().getActivationFunction();
046        float errorSignal = objectiveGradients.get(j + 1) * activationFunction.determineGradientForOutput(activation.output());
047        decompositions.add(decompose(outputNode.getNeuronFunction().getLinearCombination(), activation.inputs(), errorSignal));
048        errorSignals.put(outputNode, errorSignal);
049    }
050
051    private static void decomposeAndSetErrorSignalForHiddenNode(List<GradientDecomposition<Float>> decompositions, NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int l, int j) {
052        ActivationsCachedNeuron hiddenNode = neuralNetwork.getNeuron(l, j, ActivationsCachedNeuron.class);
053        ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation activation = hiddenNode.getCache().removeLast();
054
055        // determine error signal for hidden node using back propagation
056        float backPropagation = calculateBackPropagation(neuralNetwork, errorSignals, l, j);
057        ActivationFunction activationFunction = hiddenNode.getNeuronFunction().getActivationFunction();
058        float errorSignal = backPropagation * activationFunction.determineGradientForOutput(activation.output());
059        decompositions.add(decompose(hiddenNode.getNeuronFunction().getLinearCombination(), activation.inputs(), errorSignal));
060        errorSignals.put(hiddenNode, errorSignal);
061    }
062
063    private static <N extends NeuralNetwork> float calculateBackPropagation(N neuralNetwork, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int l, int j) {
064        float backPropagation = 0.0f;
065        Map<Neuron, Float> downstreamNodes = neuralNetwork.getOutputConnections(l, j);
066        for (Map.Entry<Neuron, Float> entry : downstreamNodes.entrySet()) {
067            float downstreamWeight = entry.getValue();
068            float downstreamErrorSignal = errorSignals.getOrDefault(entry.getKey(), 0.0f);
069            backPropagation += downstreamErrorSignal * downstreamWeight;
070        }
071        return backPropagation;
072    }
073
074    private static GradientDecomposition<Float> decompose(LinearCombination<Float> linearCombination, Array<Float> inputs, float errorSignal) {
075        Array<Float> parameterGradients = JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT.createArray(inputs.length() + 1);
076        parameterGradients.set(0, errorSignal); // bias term
077        for (int d = 1; d < parameterGradients.length(); d++) {
078            parameterGradients.set(d, errorSignal * inputs.get(d - 1));
079        }
080        return new GradientDecomposition<>(linearCombination, new TypedVector<>(parameterGradients, true, linearCombination.getNumberTypeSupport()));
081    }
082}
